mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address(a_no, m_no, a_pcode, a_addr, a_daddr, a_destn) VALUES (address_seq.nextval, #{m_no} ,#{a_pcode}, #{a_addr}, #{a_daddr}, #{a_destn})
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET a_pcode = #{a_pcode}, a_addr = #{a_addr}, a_daddr = #{a_daddr} ,a_destn = #{a_destn}, a_date = sysdate WHERE a_no = #{a_no}
